caption.p: The PirB toxin protein of VP AHPND can localize to shrimp hemocytes. (a) SDS-PAGE and Western blot analysis of recombinant His-rPirA and His-rPirB proteins, (i) His-rPirA, (ii) His-rPirB. (b) Localization of Pir toxin proteins in primary hemocytes of P. vannamei was analyzed by confocal microscopy. Hemocytes treated with 0.1 µM recombinant His-rPirA or His-rPirB proteins for 2 h, followed by immunofluorescence analysis using an anti-His antibody. The images shown represent one of three independent experiments
